title: AQS 1 Specification Sheet for Outdoor Particulate and Gas Monitor
summary: The AQS 1 is a near reference real-time outdoor monitor designed for environmental professionals to continuously measure specific dust fractions (PM1, PM2.5, PM4, PM10, TSP), gases (O3, NO2, CO, SO2, H2S, CH4, VOCs), wind, weather, noise, and location. It offers affordable and defensible measurement for various industrial applications.
